entry.value: SELECT distinct CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') END as swidtag, lower(host_id) as equipment_id, allocated_metric as allocated_metric, allocated_users as allocated_users FROM FLOWFILE WHERE host_id IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND host_id <> ''

SELECT distinct lower(coalesce(application_instance_name,coalesce(application_id,application_name))) as Instance_id, CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') END as swidtag FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> ''

select distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, lower(application_name) as name, environment as environment, lower(domain) as domain from FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> ''

select distinct lower("softpartition_id") as softpartition_id, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE softpartition_id IS NULL OR server_id IS NULL OR softpartition_id = '' OR server_id = ''

SELECT distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') END as swidtag FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> ''
select distinct lower("cluster_name") as cluster_name, lower("vcenter_name") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE cluster_name IS NOT NULL AND cluster_name <> ''

select distinct lower("softpartition_id") as softpartition_id, lower("softpartition_name") as softpartition_name, vcpu as vcpu, lower(environment) as environment, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE softpartition_id IS NOT NULL AND server_id IS NOT NULL AND softpartition_id <> '' AND server_id <> ''
select distinct lower("vcenter_name") as vcenter_name, lower("vcenter_version") as vcenter_version from FLOWFILE WHERE vcenter_name IS NOT NULL AND vcenter_name <> ''

select distinct sku as sku, CSC as corporate_sourcing_contract, ordering_date as ordering_date, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, TRIM(product_version) as product_version, software_provider as software_provider, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, maintenance_licences as maintenance_licenses, unit_price as unit_price, maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, maintenance_provider as maintenance_provider, maintenance_start as maintenance_start, maintenance_end as maintenance_end, last_PO as last_purchased_order, support_number as support_number from FLOWFILE WHERE sku IS NULL OR product_name IS NULL OR product_editor IS NULL OR metric IS NULL OR acquired_licenses IS NULL OR unit_price IS NULL OR sku = '' OR product_name = '' OR product_editor = '' OR metric = '' OR acquired_licenses = '' OR unit_price = ''

select distinct lower(server_id) as server_id, lower(server_name) as server_name, lower(server_type) as server_type, lower(server_os) as server_os, lower(cpu_model) as cpu_model, cpu_manufacturer as cpu_manufacturer, cores_per_processor as cores_per_processor, oracle_core_factor as oracle_core_factor, ibm_pvu as ibm_pvu, sag_uvu as sag_uvu, server_processors_numbers as server_processors_numbers, lower(hyperthreading) as hyperthreading, lower(datacenter_name) as datacenter_name, lower(environment) as environment, lower(cluster_name) as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE server_id <> '' AND cpu_model <> '' AND cores_per_processor <> '' AND cpu_manufacturer <> '' AND server_processors_numbers <> '' AND server_id IS NOT NULL AND cpu_model IS NOT NULL AND cores_per_processor IS NOT NULL AND cpu_manufacturer IS NOT NULL AND server_processors_numbers IS NOT NULL

select distinct product_name as name, product_editor as editor, product_version as version, lower(host_id) as equipment_id from FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NULL OR product_editor IS NULL OR host_id IS NULL OR product_name = '' OR product_editor = '' OR host_id = ''

select distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, lower(application_name) as name, environment as environment, lower(domain) as domain from FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NULL AND application_name = ''

SELECT distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, lower(host_id) as Equipment_id FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND host_id IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> '' AND host_id <> ''

select distinct CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') END as swidtag, sku as sku, CSC as corporate_sourcing_contract, ordering_date as ordering_date, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, TRIM(product_version) as product_version, software_provider as software_provider, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, maintenance_licences as maintenance_licenses, unit_price as unit_price, maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, maintenance_provider as maintenance_provider, maintenance_start as maintenance_start, maintenance_end as maintenance_end, last_PO as last_purchased_order, support_number as support_number, unit_price * acquired_licenses as total_license_cost, COALESCE(maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(maintenance_licences,0) as total_maintenance_cost, COALESCE(unit_price,0) * COALESCE(acquired_licenses,0) + COALESCE(maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(maintenance_licences,0) as total_cost from FLOWFILE WHERE sku <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND metric <> '' AND acquired_licenses <> '' AND unit_price <> ''

select distinct CASE WHEN product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_version <> '' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,''), ' ', '<>'), '><', ''),'<>','_') END as swidtag, product_name as name, product_editor as editor, product_version as version from FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> ''

select distinct lower(server_id) as server_id, lower(server_type) as server_type, lower(server_os) as server_os, lower(cpu_model) as cpu_model, cpu_manufacturer as cpu_manufacturer, cores_per_processor as cores_per_processor, oracle_core_factor as oracle_core_factor, ibm_pvu as ibm_pvu, sag_uvu as sag_uvu, server_processors_numbers as server_processors_numbers, lower(hyperthreading) as hyperthreading, lower(datacenter_name) as datacenter_name, lower(cluster_name) as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE server_id = '' OR cpu_model = '' OR cores_per_processor = '' OR cpu_manufacturer = '' OR server_processors_numbers = '' OR server_id IS NULL OR cpu_model IS NULL OR cores_per_processor IS NULL OR cpu_manufacturer IS NULL OR server_processors_numbers IS NULL

processors.name: Store Original File Name and ID

entry.value: SELECT distinct lower(coalesce(application_id,application_name)) as application_id, lower(coalesce(application_instance_name,coalesce(application_id,application_name))) as Instance_id, environment as environment FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_name IS NOT NULL AND application_name <> ''
